name: Hidden Words (itch)
description:
Hangman is a game where a player thinks of a word and makes another player guess which word the player is thinking and write each letter one after another. If the letter is not correct, a stickman drawing of a man hanging is drawn part by part.

With this understanding of how the game works, Liki Studios created a hangman like game were the player guesses a letter from the word the computer chooses.

If the letter is not correct, a move will be taken until no move is left.

Check out my other game "Wild Hat" for android:

Amazon app store: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BCP9J814/ref=apps_sf_sta

For browsers(best played on android): https://liki-studios.itch.io/wild-hat/
